page.title: 12MEDIA
page.content:
THE GROUPS WE PICKED WERE{C OF E
LADIES 40-50 AND{BEECHWOOD}MEN OF THE SAME AGE. {40%}OF THE{C OF E}SCHOOL HAD THREE {TELEVISIONS. 60% }HAD TWO T.V.'S .{65% OF THE{C OF E}LADIES READ ONE{BOOK}A WEEK,BUT THE OTHER{35%}DON'T READ ANY AT ALL.{50%}OF THE{BEECHWOOD}MEN DON'T READ ANY BOOKS EITHER.{12%}READ THREE {BOOKS}A WEEK.MOST WOMEN ONLY READ TWO {MAGAZINES}A WEEK,BUT{20%}OF THEM READ 10{NEWSPAPERS}A WEEK.MOST PEOPLE IN{C {OF E}DON'T READ ANY{MAGAZINES}WITH THE EXCEPTION OF ONE WHO READS TWENTY A WEEK.ONLY ONE PERSON OF{C OF E}HAD A {VIDEO}BUT{69%}OF{BEECHWOOD}HAVE ONE.{40%}OF{C OF E}LADIES HAVE TWO{CAR {RADIOS}BUT{6%}OF{BEECHWOOD}HAVE 5.WE FOUND OUT THAT ONE PERSON IN{C OF E HAS 6{RADIOS}BUT WE ALSO FOUND OUT THAT{6%}HAVE 6{RADIOS.
